title: Assign ICD-10 Codes
description: A professional coder is reviewing an inpatient record to assign ICD-10-CM (diagnosis) and ICD-10-PCS (procedure) codes.

tasks.description: Thoroughly review the patient's entire inpatient record, including the discharge summary, H&P, and physician notes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Coder gains a complete understanding of the patient's hospital stay.

tasks.description: Identify the principal diagnosis and all secondary diagnoses (comorbidities and complications).
tasks.expected_outcome: Coder correctly determines the primary reason for admission and all other treated conditions.

tasks.description: Assign the appropriate ICD-10-CM and ICD-10-PCS codes for all diagnoses and significant procedures performed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Coder accurately assigns all codes, which will determine the Diagnosis-Related Group (DRG) for payment.
